MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G72 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.45pm to remove debris from the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:14PM on Sunday 07 February 2021.
